messages.askParentsText: Please ask your parents to buy Chobots Citizenship with a credit card or PayPal
messages.citizenOnlyText: - Exclusive clothing - House Upgrades - Pets Upgrades - Additional Furniture - Lots of cool features!
messages.comingSoonText: - Secret Locations - Cities and many other things!
messages.confirmExtendMembership: Your Citizenship will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}. Do you wish to extend it?
messages.itemOfTheMonthControlText: Become a Citizen today! Get the exclusive item of the month!
messages.itemOfTheMonthText:
This item is available only for Chobots who will buy the citizenship during this month!
You can always exchange it for 2000 Bugs by putting this item to garbage can in your wardrobe!
messages.paymentExplanationText: After you click Ð° Buy Now button, you will be redirected to payment system
messages.statusCannotUpgradeText: Sorry, a citizenship for more than 2 years could not be bought
messages.statusUpgradeText: Congratulations! You are a citizen of Chobots World. Your passport expires in {0} days. To prolong it, click on the continue button
messages.tryTooltip: You are under 30 days or you have already tried this
messages.wannaBeSpecial: Wanna be special? Join today and get one of these exclusive items
